fields_of_interest: Agriculture, Culture and media, Education and training, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Research and innovation, Food Safety, Digital economy and society, Transport
eu_initiatives:
BDVA is the private side of the Big Data cPPP 
 
Through its strategic research and innovation agendas and other activities it hopes to influence the EU investment and direciton in the field of Big Data in Europe
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
membership: BDVA is member of the Digital Skills and Jobs Coalition.
relevant_communication:
Main publication: http://www.bdva.eu/sites/default/files/BDVA_SRIA_v4_Ed1.1.pdf 
 
Other publications (whitepapers, position papers, etc) can be found here: http://www.bdva.eu/?q=downloads 
 
Our annual event: European Big Data Value Forum: http://www.european-big-data-value-forum.eu/ 
 
Participation in Big Data Value eCosystem, support action of the Big Data PPP: http://www.big-data-value.eu/ 
Full list of PPP projects can be found here: http://www.big-data-value.eu/projects/
goals__remit: To boost European Big Data Value research, development and innovation
